title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 175.6 - Limit of driving time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 175.6 - Limit of driving time

State Regulations

When a driver of a motor truck and/or motor bus shall have
had 10 hours driving time within a consecutive period of 14 hours, he shall not
continue or again go on duty without having at least eight consecutive hours
off duty. In no event shall a driver have more than 60 hours driving time in a
calendar week. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
175.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
